contentList.body: {"url":"QmafLWchF5pSxyk5tuSsQxFE8Yvm4hNMa25Jcy37Y4fCir","type":"ipfs"}

In Greek mythology, Persephone was the daughter of Zeus and Demeter, goddess of harvest and fertility. She was very beautiful and lovely, which led to her mother protecting her very much to keep all men away from her.

Hades, god of the underworld was very attracted to Persephone. When he asked Demeter if he could marry Persephone, Demeter refused.

One day, Persephone was playing in a flower field when suddenly the earth beneath her opened and Hades came out with his chariot and abducted her. This abduction was witnessed by Zeus and Helios, the all-seeing Sun god.

Demeter came looking for Persephone but was devastated when no one knew where her daughter was.
{"url":"QmaVXwtL6n5t8Ka6bChrBoQ9NPDG3vY8FxgCbwg122CoTN","type":"ipfs"}

Helios finally told Demeter that Persephone was taken to the Underworld by Hades. Demeter was furious at the Gods for not telling her right away and punished the world by leaving her duties behind. The earth began to dry up, followed with deaths of animals and famine.

Zeus heard the cry of people for help. He decided that Persephone would spend half of the year with her mother and the other half with Hades, his husband. Both parties weren't excited, but they accepted the deal.

According to ancient Greeks, this explains why in Autumn and Winter the earth isn't fertile because Demeter is waiting for her daughter's return. And when they reunite, the earth is fertile in Spring and Summer.

contentList.body: {"url":"Qmah18t3mDtwZQ6dLfcwzT61ZZw6zFToQM6Qcs1cbDjpMt","type":"ipfs"}

The horror based movie tells a story about some people that got trapped inside a field of grass, they try to find a way out only to find out that everything keeps repeating again and again. A cycle of dead that keeps repeating itself.
{"url":"QmeBxAfinCMpmGe5XiUdZD2pJQfL9P7h7vqop8NJayx6uq","type":"ipfs"}

I think the movie itself is very interesting and is quite hard to understand for the first time. It makes you thing of why the same thing keeps repeating and why the people can’t get out of the grass.
{"url":"QmWmMwSkv4Ri2CqQctfXdqKFfYw9v6icjTDvvN3XrDmEPw","type":"ipfs"}
{"url":"QmbGqPEvUBMPqA9PUc8NuR1F6REvYoMd34qA8HhVmVK58a","type":"ipfs"}

Backsplash is kind of tile that is commonly used on kitchen and bathroom wall. Kitchen backsplash have the purpose of protecting the wall behind stove. The wall usually gets dirty easily due to the hot oil and other food substance. 

There are some people who want their kitchen to be fun and unique. Unique backsplash can be one of the elements.
{"url":"QmXvuLA1axCM3mcMJnsm4tPS3kw3YqJTkUZAp75L6bGCiU","type":"ipfs"}

Arabesque tile 
This type of backsplash is unique due to its shape. The shape is uncommonly used and gives elegant vibe to the kitchen. There are a lot of shades and it is also unique if they have some color combination.
{"url":"QmTsjUDRYGvfR7JudrabfN5fBJC47fTSdvXqfjaTYBN13a","type":"ipfs"}

Moroccan tile
This pattern is originated from Morocco. Mixed pattern can be applied if you like a little bit crowded look, but if you like more even look you can use only one pattern and make it more repetitive.
{"url":"QmNyvLDHMhWxqXNbE7BMvdXD4MsQxymavFa48GkZdLEeHb","type":"ipfs"}

Hexagon Tile
This tile is actually commonly used. The placement somehow give 3D illusion. this is why it looks unique. using different colors also give more full impression.

contentList.body: {"url":"QmRdzm5zx2rv19t8kuDcjEAfdW25w5Pm3ufyEeQiJh9gVp","type":"ipfs"}

“Istriku” (1953) 
By: Dullah

Dullah is one of maestro painters from Indonesia synonymous with realistic painting. One of his painting titled “Istriku” depicts the figure of his wife, dressed beautifully in a distinctive Solo female dress, posing sitting in a chair, painted directly by Dullah.

The painting shows Dullah's painter's love for his wife, so that he really takes the time to paint his wife directly with love and affection so that the results of his paintings are truly a work of art that will be remembered forever, memories of that time, which will continue to be remembered until old age and become a historical memory for his children and grandchildren.

{"img":"http://galeri-nasional.or.id/images/logo.jpg","title":"Lukisan : Istriku (Dullah - 1953) - Galeri Nasional Indonesia - Website resmi Galeri Nasional Indonesia (GALNAS)","desc":"Lukisan yang berjudul Istriku karya Dullah - Galeri Nasional Indonesia - Website resmi Galeri Nasional Indonesia (GALNAS)","url":"http://galeri-nasional.or.id/collections/510-istriku"}

contentList.body: {"url":"QmSi2xUpXNv3hxDF5tgrpXzjnrArsHKPZFxhEUzB6NWwdH","type":"ipfs"}

Set in 1969, "Bad Times At The El-Royale" follows of the story of 7 strangers who stayed in a hotel in the border of California-Nevada. Those strangers are two sisters, a Catholic priest, a salesman, and the hotel employee.
In that hotel, the 7 strangers hide a dark secret about themselves and everyone is not really what they seem.
{"url":"QmWH3gfxLs8HJuyfQWGHLKkahzQ7gtTc3hhC9BumYiPUYG","type":"ipfs"}
{"url":"QmRYaoVeDV3bWTT7XnCy2jFaLG3EnqMJzF97WsLySUNMbG","type":"ipfs"}

This movie is a must-watch because of how the mystery was build up. Every scene leaves us wondering and curious about what secret these characters are hiding from us. This movie is unpredictable; which makes it more suspenseful.
